episode.title: He Ends Up Fighting Hervé Villechaize
episode.rawTitle: 191: ‘He Ends Up Fighting Hervé Villechaize’ With Jim Dalrymple
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to speculate about what Apple might announce at the upcoming WWDC 2017: Apple Watch, iPad, iOS, updated MacBooks, Apple TV, and more. Also: a celebration of the great Roger Moore.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to speculate about what Apple might announce at the upcoming WWDC 2017: Apple Watch, iPad, iOS, updated MacBooks, Apple TV, and more. Also: a celebration of the great Roger Moore.

Links:

  • Car reviewer Nick Murray on Alcantara, the synthetic leather Microsoft is using for their new Surface Laptops.
  • CNBC: Tim Cook spotted testing Apple Watch glucose monitor.
  • Marc Haynes on meeting Roger Moore as a 7-year-old in 1983.
  • Fred Brooks’s “The Mythical Man Month”.
  • Seth Weintraub’s preview of iOS 7 a few days before it was announced at WWDC 2013.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
